Ingredients.1: 1 (14.1 ounce) package Idahoan® Buttery Golden Selects Mashed Potatoes

Ingredients.4: 1 cup chopped, cooked bacon or prepared bacon bits

Ingredients.7: 24 large mushrooms, or more depending on size

Directions.2: Prepare mashed potatoes according to package directions.

Directions.3: Add shredded cheese (reserve enough to top mushrooms), chives and bacon.

Directions.4: Remove stems from clean mushrooms and stuff caps with potato mixture.

Directions.5: Spread olive oil and minced garlic on bottom of walled cookie sheet or baking dish. Place mushrooms on top.

Directions.6: Sprinkle shredded cheddar over the top of the mushrooms.
